definitions.definition: The state of being calm; peacefulness ; absence of worry , anger , fear or other strong negative emotion.
The state of being calm; absence of noise and disturbance .
A period of time without wind .

main_definition: ( in a person ) The state of being calm; peacefulness ; absence of worry , anger , fear or other strong negative emotion.
secondary_definitions: ( in a place or situation ) The state of being calm; absence of noise and disturbance .
A period of time without wind .
